

## 入口搜尋引擎

### ![](https://www.google.com.tw/images/branding/product/ico/googleg_lodp.ico) Google 

* **URL**

```
https://www.google.com.tw/search?q=%s&hl=zh-TW
```

* **Suggestion URL**

```
https://www.google.com/complete/search?client=firefox&q=%s
```



---

### ![](https://mbp.yimg.com/sy/rz/l/favicon.ico) Yahoo! 奇摩 

* **URL**

```
https://tw.search.yahoo.com/search?p=%s&fr=opensearch
```

* **Suggestion URL**

```
https://tw.search.yahoo.com/sugg/os?command=%s&output=fxjson&fr=opensearch
```



---

###  ![](https://www.bing.com/sa/simg/bing_p_rr_teal_min.ico) Bing

* **URL**

```
https://www.bing.com/search?q=%s
```

* **Suggestion URL**

```
https://api.bing.com/osjson.aspx?query=%s&language=zh-TW&form=OSDJAS
```



---

###  ![]( https://duckduckgo.com/favicon.ico ) DuckDuckGo

* **URL**

```
https://duckduckgo.com/?q=%s
```

* **Suggestion URL**

```
https://ac.duckduckgo.com/ac/?q=%s&type=list
```



---

## 辭典、百科、知識搜尋

###  ![](https://mbp.yimg.com/sy/rz/l/favicon.ico) Yahoo! 奇摩字典

* **URL**

```
https://tw.dictionary.search.yahoo.com/search?p=%s&amp;fr=opensearch
```

* **Suggestion URL**

```
https://tw.search.yahoo.com/sugg/os?command=%s&amp;output=fxjson&amp;fr=opensearch&amp;pubid=1306&amp;appid=tw.dictionary.search.yahoo.com
```



---

###  ![](https://zh.wikipedia.org/static/favicon/wikipedia.ico) 維基百科

* **URL**

```
https://zh.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?search=%s
```

* **Suggestion URL**

```
https://zh.wikipedia.org/w/api.php?action=opensearch&format=json&formatversion=2&search=%s&namespace=0&limit=10&suggest=true
```



---

###  ![](http://zh.wiktionary.org/favicon.ico) 維基辭典

* **URL**

```
https://zh.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?search=%s
```

* **Suggestion URL**

```
https://zh.wikipedia.org/w/api.php?action=opensearch&format=json&formatversion=2&search=%s&namespace=0&limit=10&suggest=true
```



---

###  ![](https://mbp.yimg.com/sy/rz/l/favicon.ico) Yahoo! 奇摩知識+

* **URL**

```
https://tw.answers.search.yahoo.com/search?p=%s
```

* **Suggestion URL**

```
https://tw.search.yahoo.com/sugg/os?command=%s&amp;output=fxjson&amp;fr=opensearch&amp;pubid=1306&amp;appid=/tw.answers.search.yahoo.com
```



---

## 論壇、討論區

###  ![](data:image/png;base64,) Android 台灣中文網

* **URL**

```
https://apk.tw/search.php?mod=google&cx=partner-pub-7702824122407732%3A4996651148&cof=FORID%3A10&q=%s
```

* **Suggestion URL**

```

```



---

###  ![](https://www.gamer.com.tw/favicon.ico) 巴哈姆特

* **URL**

```
https://search.gamer.com.tw/?q=%s
```

* **Suggestion URL**

```

```



---

## 影音

###  ![](https://www.youtube.com/yts/img/favicon-vfl8qSV2F.ico) YouTube

* **URL**

```
http://www.youtube.com/results?search_type=search_videos&search_query=%s&search_sort=relevance&search_category=0
```

* **Suggestion URL**

```
http://suggestqueries.google.com/complete/search?output=firefox&client=firefox&hl=zh-TW&q=%s&ds=yt
```



---

###  ![](https://www.gamer.com.tw/favicon.ico) 巴哈姆特 動畫瘋

* **URL**

```
https://ani.gamer.com.tw/search.php?kw=%s
```

* **Suggestion URL**

```

```



---

###  ![](https://cdn.anicdn.com/favicon-16x16.png) Anime1.me

* **URL**

```
https://anime1.me/?s=%s
```

* **Suggestion URL**

```

```
